section_title: PROTOCOL ARTICLE 2.3 (adverse impacts of policies and measures)
sentences: This issue (FCCC/SB/2011/1 and MISC.1) was considered by the SBSTA plenary on 9 June and through a joint SBI/SBSTA contact group and informal consultations co-chaired by Anastasia Theodorou (Hungary) and Eduardo Calvo Buendía (Peru).
The SBSTA adopted conclusions on 16 June.
The relevant discussions have been summarized under the SBI agenda item on Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects and impacts of response measures).
